00043 #define EUNDEFINED 1000.0

00045 inline int SQR(int i) { return i*i; }
00046 
00047 
00048 // extract energy of eigenstate
00049 double energy(const Projection* P, const Eigenstates* E,
00050               int j, int p, int i)
00051 {
00052   int ipj = idxpij(P->jmax,p,j);
00053   int ngood = E->ngood[ipj];
00054 
00055   fprintf(stderr, "\n");
00056 
00057   if (!ngood)
00058     return EUNDEFINED;
00059 
00060   if (i>=ngood) 
00061     i=ngood-1;
00062 
00063   return E->v[ipj][E->index[ipj][i]];
00064 }

00067 // calculate the ovlap of the n-th config with the n-1 configs for j,p
00068 double calcbasisovlap(const Projection* P, const Eigenstates *E, 
00069                       const complex double ***ovlmes, 
00070                       int n, int j, int p)
00071 {
00072   int ipj = idxpij(P->jmax,p,j);
00073  
00074   complex double* nbb = malloc(SQR((n-1)*(j+1))*sizeof(complex double)); 
00075   complex double* obb = malloc(SQR((n-1)*(j+1))*sizeof(complex double));
00076 
00077   int a,b,ia,idxa,iai,ib,idxb,ibi,ka,kb,dim;
00078 
00079   dim=0;
00080   for (a=0; a<n-1; a++)
00081     dim += E[a].ngood[ipj];
00082 
00083   for (idxb=0; idxb<dim; idxb++)
00084     for (idxa=0; idxa<dim; idxa++)
00085       nbb[idxa+idxb*dim] = 0.0;
00086       
00087   // n-1 overlap matrix
00088 
00089   idxb=-1;
00090   for (b=0; b<n-1; b++)
00091     for (ib=0; ib<E[b].ngood[ipj]; ib++) {
00092       ibi = E[b].index[ipj][ib];
00093       idxb++;
00094       idxa=-1;
00095       for (a=0; a<n-1; a++)
00096         for (ia=0; ia<E[a].ngood[ipj]; ia++) {
00097           iai = E[a].index[ipj][ia];
00098           idxa++;
00099           for (kb=0; kb<j+1; kb++)
00100             for (ka=0; ka<j+1; ka++)
00101               nbb[idxa+idxb*dim] += 
00102                 conj(E[a].V[ipj][ka+iai*(j+1)])*
00103                 ovlmes[a+b*n][ipj][ka+kb*(j+1)]*
00104                 E[b].V[ipj][kb+ibi*(j+1)];
00105         }
00106     }
00107 
00108   // one operator
00109 
00110   double thresh=1e-9;
00111   pseudoinverse(nbb, obb, dim, thresh);
00112 
00113   // calculate one operator matrix element
00114           
00115   int i,ii,k,kp;
00116   double ovlmax = 0.0, ovl;
00117 
00118   // return biggest overlap
00119   for (i=0; i<E[n-1].ngood[ipj]; i++) {
00120 
00121     ovl = 0.0;
00122 
00123     ii = E[n-1].index[ipj][i];
00124     idxb=-1;
00125     for (b=0; b<n-1; b++)
00126       for (ib=0; ib<E[b].ngood[ipj]; ib++) {
00127         ibi = E[b].index[ipj][ib];
00128         idxb++;
00129         idxa=-1;
00130         for (a=0; a<n-1; a++)
00131           for (ia=0; ia<E[a].ngood[ipj]; ia++) {
00132             iai = E[a].index[ipj][ia];
00133             idxa++;
00134 
00135             for (kb=0; kb<j+1; kb++)
00136               for (ka=0; ka<j+1; ka++)
00137                 for (kp=0; kp<j+1; kp++)
00138                   for (k=0; k<j+1; k++)
00139                     
00140                     ovl += conj(E[n-1].V[ipj][k+ii*(j+1)])*
00141                       ovlmes[(n-1)+a*n][ipj][k+ka*(j+1)]*
00142                       E[a].V[ipj][ka+iai*(j+1)]*
00143                       obb[idxa+idxb*dim]*
00144                       conj(E[b].V[ipj][kb+ibi*(j+1)])*
00145                       ovlmes[b+(n-1)*n][ipj][kb+kp*(j+1)]*
00146                       E[n-1].V[ipj][kp+ii*(j+1)]/
00147                       E[n-1].norm[ipj][ii];
00148 
00149           }
00150       }
00151 
00152     if (ovl > ovlmax)
00153       ovlmax = ovl;
00154   }
00155                          
00156   free(nbb);
00157   free(obb);
00158 
00159   return ovlmax;
00160 }

00163 static int cmpmerit(void* ap, void* bp) 
00164 {
00165   double a=*(double*) ap;
00166   double b=*(double*) bp;
00167   
00168   return (a<=b ? (a<b ? 1 : 0) : -1);
00169 }
00170 
00171 double calcenergyeigenvalue(const Projection* P, const Eigenstates *E, 
00172                             const Observablesod*** obsme, 
00173                             int n, int j, int p, int ei,
00174                             double thresh, double minnorm)
00175 {
00176   int ipj=idxpij(P->jmax,p,j);
00177   int dim, i;
00178   double norma2, normb2;
00179 
00180   dim=0;
00181   for (i=0; i<n; i++)
00182     dim += E[i].ngood[ipj];
00183 
00184   // do we have at least a one-dimensional space
00185   if (dim == 0) {
00186     return EUNDEFINED;
00187   } else {
00188 
00189     complex double *H = malloc(SQR(n*(j+1))*sizeof(complex double));
00190     complex double *N = malloc(SQR(n*(j+1))*sizeof(complex double));
00191     complex double *v = malloc(n*(j+1)*sizeof(complex double));
00192     complex double *V = malloc(SQR(n*(j+1))*sizeof(complex double));
00193   
00194     int a, b;
00195     int m, k, l;
00196     int d;
00197     int ai, bi, iai, ibi, idxa, idxb;
00198  
00199     idxb=-1;
00200     for (b=0; b<n; b++)
00201       for (bi=0; bi<E[b].ngood[ipj]; bi++) {
00202         ibi=E[b].index[ipj][bi];
00203         normb2=E[b].norm[ipj][ibi];
00204         idxb++;
00205         idxa=-1;
00206         for (a=0; a<n; a++)     
00207           for (ai=0; ai<E[a].ngood[ipj]; ai++) {
00208             iai=E[a].index[ipj][ai];
00209             norma2=E[a].norm[ipj][iai];
00210             idxa++;
00211             N[idxa+idxb*dim] = 0.0;
00212             H[idxa+idxb*dim] = 0.0;
00213 
00214             for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2)
00215               for (m=-j; m<=j; m=m+2) {
00216                 N[idxa+idxb*dim] +=
00217                   conj(E[a].V[ipj][idxjm(j,m)+iai*(j+1)])*
00218                   obsme[a+b*n][ipj][idxjmk(j,m,k)].n*
00219                   E[b].V[ipj][idxjm(j,k)+ibi*(j+1)]/
00220                   sqrt(norma2*normb2);
00221                          
00222                 H[idxa+idxb*dim] +=
00223                   conj(E[a].V[ipj][idxjm(j,m)+iai*(j+1)])*
00224                   obsme[a+b*n][ipj][idxjmk(j,m,k)].h*
00225                   E[b].V[ipj][idxjm(j,k)+ibi*(j+1)]/
00226                   sqrt(norma2*normb2);
00227 
00228               } 
00229           }     
00230       }      
00231 
00232     generalizedeigensystem(H, N, dim, thresh, v, V, &d);
00233 
00234     // we got d eigenstates, filter out the noise
00235     // see sortEigenstates
00236 
00237     complex double norm[d];
00238     for (i=0; i<d; i++) {
00239       norm[i] = 0.0;
00240       for (l=0; l<dim; l++)
00241         for (k=0; k<dim; k++)
00242           norm[i] += conj(V[k+i*dim])*N[k+l*dim]*V[l+i*dim];
00243     }
00244 
00245     double maxnorm = 0.0;
00246     for (i=0; i<d; i++)
00247       maxnorm = fmax(maxnorm, creal(norm[i]));
00248 
00249     // for debugging
00250     /*
00251     for (i=0; i<d; i++)
00252       fprintf(stderr, "i: %d, e[i] = %8.3f MeV, n[i] = %7.5f\n", i, hbc*creal(v[i]), norm[i]);
00253     */
00254 
00255     // merits
00256 
00257     struct merit {
00258       double val;
00259       int idx;
00260     } merits[d];
00261 
00262     for (i=0; i<d; i++) {
00263       merits[i].idx = i;
00264       if (creal(norm[i]) < minnorm*maxnorm)
00265         merits[i].val = -100000.0;
00266       else
00267         merits[i].val = -creal(v[i]);
00268     }
00269 
00270     // sort according to merits value
00271     qsort(merits, d, sizeof(struct merit), cmpmerit);
00272 
00273     i=0; while (i<d && merits[i].val > -100000.0) i++;
00274 
00275     if (i < ei)
00276       return EUNDEFINED;
00277 
00278     double e = -merits[ei].val;
00279 
00280     free(H);
00281     free(N);
00282     free(v);
00283     free(V);
00284 
00285     return e;
00286   }
00287 }

00290 void readorcalcandwriteprojectedMBMEfromtoFile(const char* mbfile, const char* mbfilep,
00291                                                const Projection* P, 
00292                                                const ManyBodyOperator* Op,
00293                                                const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp, 
00294                                                Symmetry S, Symmetry Sp,
00295                                                const void** mbme)
00296 {
00297   // allocate space
00298   *mbme = initprojectedMBME(P, Op);
00299 
00300   if (readprojectedMBMEfromFile(mbfile, mbfilep, P, Op, S, Sp, *mbme)) {
00301 #ifdef MPI
00302     calcprojectedMBMEmpi(P, Op, Q, Qp, S, Sp, *mbme); 
00303 #else
00304     calcprojectedMBME(P, Op, Q, Qp, S, Sp, *mbme); 
00305 #endif
00306     writeprojectedMBMEtoFile(mbfile, mbfilep, P, Op, S, Sp, *mbme); 
00307   }
00308 
00309   // scale interaction matrix elements
00310 
00311   if (!strncmp(Op->name, "Observables", 11)) {
00312     Interaction* Int = Op->par;
00313 
00314     if (Int->mescaling) {
00315       scaleprojectedObservablesMBME(P, Int, *mbme);
00316     }
00317   }
00318         
00319 }

00322 void cleanup(int ret)
00323 {
00324 #ifdef MPI
00325   int task=TASKFIN;
00326   BroadcastTask(&task);
00327 
00328   MPI_Finalize();
00329 #endif
00330 
00331   exit(ret);
00332 }

00334 
00335 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00336 {
00337   createinfo(argc, argv);
00338 
00339 #ifdef MPI
00340   MPI_Init(&argc, &argv);
00341   MPI_Comm_rank(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &mpirank);
00342   MPI_Comm_size(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &mpisize);
00343 
00344   // fprintf(stderr, "... [%2d] %s\n", mpirank, hostname());
00345 
00346   if (mpirank != 0) {
00347     ProjectionSlave();
00348 
00349     MPI_Finalize();
00350   } else {
00351 #endif
00352 
00353 
00354   /* enough arguments ? */
00355 
00356   if (argc < 3) {
00357     fprintf(stderr, "\nusage: %s [OPTIONS] PROJPAR INTERACTION NUCSFILE"
00358             "\n   -f FIXNUCSFILE"
00359             "\n   -n N           search only for up to N states"
00360             "\n   -j JSEL        select for angular momentum JSEL"
00361             "\n   -p PSEL        select for parity PSEL [0|1]"
00362             "\n   -i ISEL        select for #ISEL"
00363             "\n   -o OVLTHRESH   overlap threshold"
00364             "\n   -e ENTHRESH    energy threshold [MeV]"
00365             "\n   -t THRESH      threshold for SVD\n", argv[0]);
00366     exit(-1);
00367   }
00368 
00369   int odd;
00370   double threshkmix=0.01;
00371   double minnormkmix=0.001;
00372   int all=0;
00373   double threshmulti=0.0000001;
00374   double minnormmulti=0.001;
00375   double ovlthresh=0.95;
00376   double enthresh=0.050/hbc;
00377   int nmax=0;
00378   // optimize for which quantum numbers
00379   int jsel=0, psel=0, isel=0;
00380 
00381   char* fixnucsfile = NULL;
00382 
00383   /* manage command-line options */
00384 
00385   char c;
00386   while ((c = getopt(argc, argv, "f:t:n:j:p:i:o:e:")) != -1)
00387     switch (c) {
00388     case 'f':
00389       fixnucsfile = optarg;
00390       break;
00391     case 't':
00392       threshmulti = atof(optarg);
00393       break;
00394     case 'n':
00395       nmax = atoi(optarg);
00396       break;
00397     case 'j':
00398       jsel = atoi(optarg);
00399       break;
00400     case 'p':
00401       psel = atoi(optarg);
00402       break;
00403     case 'i':
00404       isel = atoi(optarg);
00405       break;
00406     case 'o':
00407       ovlthresh = atof(optarg);
00408       break;
00409     case 'e':
00410       enthresh = atof(optarg)/hbc;
00411       break;
00412     }
00413 
00414   char* projpar = argv[optind];
00415   char* interactionfile = argv[optind+1];
00416   char* nucsfile = argv[optind+2];
00417 
00418   char* mbfile[MAXSTATES];
00419   int fixn=0, searchn, n, nsel;
00420   int i;
00421 
00422   // are there fixed configs ?
00423   if (fixnucsfile) {
00424     if (readstringsfromfile(fixnucsfile, &fixn, mbfile)) {
00425       fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s\n", fixnucsfile);
00426       cleanup(-1);
00427     }
00428   }
00429   nsel = fixn;
00430 
00431   // possibly there are identical states in nucsfile and fixnucsfile
00432   // they should be eliminated by the overlap threshold
00433   if (readstringsfromfile(nucsfile, &searchn, &mbfile[fixn])) {
00434     fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s\n", nucsfile);
00435     cleanup(-1);
00436   }
00437  
00438   // total number of states
00439   n = fixn + searchn;
00440 
00441   // which many-body states are selected
00442   int idx[n];
00443   
00444   // selected (best) energies for set of i states
00445   double esel[n];
00446 
00447   // maximum number of states to select
00448   if (nmax==0) 
00449     nmax=n;
00450   else 
00451     nmax=fixn+nmax;
00452 
00453 
00454   SlaterDet Q[n]; 
00455   Symmetry S[n];
00456 
00457   for (i=0; i<n; i++) {
00458     extractSymmetryfromString(&mbfile[i], &S[i]);
00459     if (readSlaterDetfromFile(&Q[i], mbfile[i])) {
00460       fprintf(stderr, "couldn't read from %s\n", mbfile[i]);
00461       cleanup(-1);
00462     }
00463   }
00464 
00465   Interaction Int;
00466   if (readInteractionfromFile(&Int, interactionfile)) {
00467     fprintf(stderr, "couldn't read Interaction from %s\n", interactionfile);
00468     cleanup(-1);
00469   }
00470   Int.cm = 1; 
00471 
00472   // odd number of nucleons ?
00473   odd = Q[0].A % 2;
00474 
00475   // integer or half-integer jsel - compatible with odd ?
00476   if (odd != jsel %2) {
00477     fprintf(stderr, "not possible to project on j=%d\n", jsel);
00478     cleanup(-1);
00479   }
00480 
00481 #ifdef MPI
00482   int task=TASKSTART;
00483   BroadcastTask(&task);
00484 
00485   BroadcastInteraction(&Int);
00486   BroadcastA(&Q[0].A);
00487 #endif
00488 
00489   // Projection parameters
00490   Projection P;
00491   initProjection(&P, odd, projpar);
00492 
00493   initOpObservables(&Int);
00494 
00495   int a,b; 
00496 
00497   // matrix elements
00498   complex double** ovlme[n*n];
00499   Observablesod** obsme[n*n];
00500 
00501   // keep track of already calculated matrix elements
00502   int ovlmedone[n*n];
00503   int obsmedone[n*n];
00504 
00505   // initialize space for matrix elements only on demand
00506   for (b=0; b<n; b++)   
00507     for (a=0; a<n; a++) {
00508       ovlmedone[a+b*n] = 0; obsmedone[a+b*n] = 0;
00509       ovlme[a+b*n] = NULL; obsme[a+b*n] = NULL; 
00510       // ovlme[a+b*n] = initprojectedMBME(&P, &OpOvlap);
00511       // obsme[a+b*n] = initprojectedMBME(&P, &OpObservables);
00512     }
00513 
00514   // we read/calculate the diagonal matrix elements right at the beginning
00515 
00516   for (a=0; a<n; a++) {
00517 
00518     readorcalcandwriteprojectedMBMEfromtoFile(mbfile[a], mbfile[a], &P, &OpOvlap, 
00519                                               &Q[a], &Q[a], S[a], S[a], &ovlme[a+a*n]);
00520     ovlmedone[a+a*n] = 1;
00521     
00522     readorcalcandwriteprojectedMBMEfromtoFile(mbfile[a], mbfile[a], &P, &OpObservables, 
00523                                               &Q[a], &Q[a], S[a], S[a], &obsme[a+a*n]);
00524     obsmedone[a+a*n] = 1;
00525   }
00526 
00527   // read or calculate the Eigenstates
00528       
00529   int allp=0;
00530   Eigenstates Ep[n];
00531   Observablesod** obsp = initprojectedVector(&P, &OpObservables, 1);
00532   
00533   for (i=0; i<n; i++) {
00534     if (readEigenstatesfromFile(mbfile[i], &P, &Ep[i], 1)) {
00535       fprintf(stderr, "... calculating Eigenstates for %s\n", mbfile[i]);
00536       initEigenstates(&P, &Ep[i], 1);
00537       calcEigenstates(&P, &Int, &obsme[i+i*n], &Ep[i], threshkmix);
00538       calcexpectprojectedMBME(&P, &OpObservables, &obsme[i+i*n], &S[i], &Ep[i], obsp);
00539       sortEigenstates(&P, &Int, obsp, &Ep[i], minnormkmix, allp);
00540     }
00541   }
00542 
00543 
00544   // common root for all output files
00545   char outfile[1024];
00546   if (fixn > 0)
00547     sprintf(outfile, "%s--%s--sel-%d-%d-%d", fixnucsfile, nucsfile, jsel, psel, isel);
00548   else
00549     sprintf(outfile, "%s--sel-%d-%d-%d", nucsfile, jsel, psel, isel);
00550 
00551   // the log file
00552   char nucssellogfile[1024];
00553   sprintf(nucssellogfile, "%s.log", outfile);
00554 
00555   FILE* logfp;
00556   if (!(logfp = fopen(nucssellogfile, "w"))) {
00557     fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", nucssellogfile);
00558     cleanup(-1);
00559   }  
00560   setlinebuf(logfp);
00561   fprintinfo(logfp);
00562 
00563   fprintf(logfp, "\n");
00564   fprintf(logfp, "ovlap threshold :  %5.3f\n", ovlthresh);
00565   fprintf(logfp, "energy threshold:  %5.3f MeV\n", hbc*enthresh);
00566 
00567 
00568   // Eselp and obsmesel are pointers to the selected
00569   // Eigenstates and matrixelements
00570   Symmetry Ssel[n];
00571   Eigenstates Eselp[n] ;
00572   complex double** ovlmesel[n*n];
00573   Observablesod** obsmesel[n*n];
00574   Observablesod** obs;
00575   
00576   Eigenstates multiE;
00577   Amplitudes multiA;
00578 
00579   initEigenstates(&P, &multiE, n);
00580   initAmplitudes(&P, &multiA, n);
00581   obs = initprojectedVector(&P, &OpObservables, n);
00582 
00583   int imin;
00584   double e, ovl, emin = EUNDEFINED;
00585 
00586   if (fixn) {
00587 
00588     // are there fixed states ?
00589 
00590     for (i=0; i<fixn; i++)
00591       idx[i] = i;
00592 
00593     multiE.n = fixn;
00594     multiA.n = fixn;
00595 
00596     // read/calc overlap matrix elements 
00597     for (b=0; b<fixn; b++)
00598       for (a=0; a<fixn; a++) {
00599         if (!ovlmedone[idx[a]+idx[b]*n]) {
00600           readorcalcandwriteprojectedMBMEfromtoFile(mbfile[idx[a]], mbfile[idx[b]], 
00601                                                     &P, &OpOvlap, 
00602                                                     &Q[idx[a]], &Q[idx[b]], 
00603                                                     S[idx[a]], S[idx[b]], 
00604                                                     &ovlme[idx[a]+idx[b]*n]);
00605           ovlmedone[idx[a]+idx[b]*n] = 1;         
00606         }
00607         if (!obsmedone[idx[a]+idx[b]*n]) {
00608           readorcalcandwriteprojectedMBMEfromtoFile(mbfile[idx[a]], mbfile[idx[b]], 
00609                                                     &P, &OpObservables, 
00610                                                     &Q[idx[a]], &Q[idx[b]], 
00611                                                     S[idx[a]], S[idx[b]], 
00612                                                     &obsme[idx[a]+idx[b]*n]);
00613           obsmedone[idx[a]+idx[b]*n] = 1;         
00614         }
00615       }    
00616 
00617     for (a=0; a<fixn; a++) {
00618       Ssel[a] = S[idx[a]];
00619       Eselp[a] = Ep[idx[a]];
00620     }
00621                       
00622     for (b=0; b<fixn; b++)
00623       for (a=0; a<fixn; a++) {
00624         ovlmesel[a+b*fixn] = ovlme[idx[a]+idx[b]*n];
00625         obsmesel[a+b*fixn] = obsme[idx[a]+idx[b]*n];
00626       }
00627 
00628     e = calcenergyeigenvalue(&P, Eselp, obsmesel, fixn, jsel, psel, isel, threshmulti, minnormmulti);
00629 
00630     esel[fixn-1] = e;
00631 
00632     fprintf(logfp, "\n ... taking %2d fix configs\n\n", fixn);
00633     fprintf(logfp, "\n                      energy: %8.3f MeV\n", hbc*e);
00634 
00635   } else {
00636 
00637     // find state with lowest energy
00638 
00639     imin=-1;
00640     for (a=0; a<n; a++) {
00641       e=energy(&P, &Ep[a], jsel, psel, isel);
00642 
00643       fprintf(stderr, "[%2d] - %s - energy:  %8.3f MeV\n",
00644               a, mbfile[a], hbc*e);
00645 
00646       if (e < emin) {
00647         emin = e;
00648         imin = a;
00649       }
00650     }
00651     
00652     idx[0] = imin;
00653     esel[0] = emin;
00654     nsel = 1;
00655 
00656     fprintf(logfp, "\n\n ... selecting  1 config\n\n");
00657     fprintf(logfp, "selected [%2d] - %s - energy:  %8.3f MeV\n", 
00658             imin, mbfile[imin], hbc*emin);
00659   }
00660    
00661   // now select additional configs
00662 
00663   int done=0;
00664   while (!done && nsel < nmax) {
00665 
00666     fprintf(logfp, "\n\n ... selecting %2d configs\n\n", nsel+1);
00667 
00668     // set correct dimension for eigenstates and amplitudes
00669     multiE.n = nsel+1;
00670     multiA.n = nsel+1;
00671 
00672     for (a=0; a<nsel; a++) {
00673       Ssel[a] = S[idx[a]];
00674       Eselp[a] = Ep[idx[a]];
00675     }
00676                       
00677     for (b=0; b<nsel; b++)
00678       for (a=0; a<nsel; a++) {
00679         ovlmesel[a+b*(nsel+1)] = ovlme[idx[a]+idx[b]*n];
00680         obsmesel[a+b*(nsel+1)] = obsme[idx[a]+idx[b]*n];
00681       }
00682 
00683     // find the config which lowers the energy the most and has not too much overlap
00684     // with already selected configurations
00685 
00686     imin = -1;
00687     emin = EUNDEFINED;
00688     for (i=fixn; i<n; i++) {
00689       
00690       // is i already selected ?
00691       for (int j=0; j<nsel; j++)
00692         if (idx[j] == i)
00693           goto next;
00694 
00695       // read/calc overlap matrix elements 
00696       for (a=0; a<nsel; a++) {
00697         if (!ovlmedone[idx[a]+i*n]) {
00698           readorcalcandwriteprojectedMBMEfromtoFile(mbfile[idx[a]], mbfile[i], 
00699                                                     &P, &OpOvlap, 
00700                                                     &Q[idx[a]], &Q[i], S[idx[a]], S[i], 
00701                                                     &ovlme[idx[a]+i*n]);
00702           ovlmedone[idx[a]+i*n] = 1;      
00703         }
00704         if (!ovlmedone[i+idx[a]*n]) {
00705           readorcalcandwriteprojectedMBMEfromtoFile(mbfile[i], mbfile[idx[a]], 
00706                                                     &P, &OpOvlap, 
00707                                                     &Q[i], &Q[idx[a]], S[i], S[idx[a]], 
00708                                                     &ovlme[i+idx[a]*n]);
00709           ovlmedone[i+idx[a]*n] = 1;      
00710         }
00711       }
00712 
00713       Ssel[nsel] = S[i];
00714       Eselp[nsel] = Ep[i];
00715       for (a=0; a<nsel; a++) {
00716         ovlmesel[a+nsel*(nsel+1)] = ovlme[idx[a]+i*n];
00717         ovlmesel[nsel+a*(nsel+1)] = ovlme[i+idx[a]*n];
00718       }
00719       ovlmesel[nsel+nsel*(nsel+1)] = ovlme[i+i*n];
00720 
00721       // if overlap with already selected basis states to big skip
00722       ovl = calcbasisovlap(&P, Eselp, ovlmesel, nsel+1, jsel, psel);
00723       fprintf(logfp, "[%2d]     ovlap:    %6.3f\t", i, ovl);
00724       if (ovl > ovlthresh) {
00725         fprintf(logfp, "\n");
00726         goto next;
00727       }
00728 
00729       // read/calc observables matrix elements 
00730       for (a=0; a<nsel; a++) {
00731         if (!obsmedone[idx[a]+i*n]) {
00732           readorcalcandwriteprojectedMBMEfromtoFile(mbfile[idx[a]], mbfile[i], 
00733                                                     &P, &OpObservables, 
00734                                                     &Q[idx[a]], &Q[i], S[idx[a]], S[i], 
00735                                                     &obsme[idx[a]+i*n]);
00736           obsmedone[idx[a]+i*n] = 1;      
00737         }
00738         if (!obsmedone[i+idx[a]*n]) {
00739           readorcalcandwriteprojectedMBMEfromtoFile(mbfile[i], mbfile[idx[a]], 
00740                                                     &P, &OpObservables, 
00741                                                     &Q[i], &Q[idx[a]], S[i], S[idx[a]], 
00742                                                     &obsme[i+idx[a]*n]);
00743           obsmedone[i+idx[a]*n] = 1;      
00744         }
00745       }
00746       
00747       for (a=0; a<nsel; a++) {
00748         obsmesel[a+nsel*(nsel+1)] = obsme[idx[a]+i*n];
00749         obsmesel[nsel+a*(nsel+1)] = obsme[i+idx[a]*n];
00750       }
00751       obsmesel[nsel+nsel*(nsel+1)] = obsme[i+i*n];
00752 
00753       e = calcenergyeigenvalue(&P, Eselp, obsmesel, nsel+1, jsel, psel, isel, threshmulti, minnormmulti);
00754 
00755       fprintf(logfp, "        energy:  %8.3f MeV\n", hbc*e);
00756 
00757       if (e < emin) {
00758         imin = i;
00759         emin = e;
00760       }
00761       
00762     next:
00763       ;
00764     }
00765     
00766     if (emin < esel[nsel-1]-enthresh) {
00767       idx[nsel] = imin;
00768       esel[nsel] = emin;
00769 
00770       fprintf(logfp, "\nselected [%2d] - %s - energy: %8.3f MeV\n",
00771               imin, mbfile[imin], hbc*emin);
00772 
00773       Ssel[nsel+1] = S[imin];
00774       Eselp[nsel+1] = Ep[imin];
00775       for (a=0; a<nsel; a++) {
00776         ovlmesel[a+nsel*(nsel+1)] = ovlme[idx[a]+imin*n];
00777         ovlmesel[nsel+a*(nsel+1)] = ovlme[imin+idx[a]*n];
00778       }
00779       ovlmesel[nsel+nsel*(nsel+1)] = ovlme[imin+imin*n];
00780       for (a=0; a<nsel; a++) {
00781         obsmesel[a+nsel*(nsel+1)] = obsme[idx[a]+imin*n];
00782         obsmesel[nsel+a*(nsel+1)] = obsme[imin+idx[a]*n];
00783       }
00784       obsmesel[nsel+nsel*(nsel+1)] = obsme[imin+imin*n];
00785 
00786       nsel++;
00787       
00788       // solve the eigenvalue problem
00789       calcMultiEigenstates(&P, &Int, obsmesel, &Eselp, &multiE, &multiA, threshmulti);
00790 
00791       // calculate expectation values
00792       calcexpectprojectedMBME(&P, &OpObservables, obsmesel, Ssel, &multiE, obs);
00793 
00794       // sort Eigenstates
00795       sortEigenstates(&P, &Int, obs, &multiE, minnormmulti, all);
00796 
00797 
00798       // create nucsfile with selected configs
00799       
00800       char nucsselfile[1024];
00801       sprintf(nucsselfile, "%s--%d", outfile, nsel);
00802       FILE *outfp;
00803       if (!(outfp = fopen(nucsselfile, "w"))) {
00804         fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", nucsselfile);
00805         cleanup(-1);
00806       }
00807       for (a=0; a<nsel; a++)
00808         if (S[idx[a]])
00809           fprintf(outfp, "%s:%s\n", SymmetrytoStr(S[idx[a]]), mbfile[idx[a]]);
00810         else
00811           fprintf(outfp, "%s\n", mbfile[idx[a]]);
00812       fclose(outfp);
00813 
00814       char nucsselprojfile[1024];
00815       sprintf(nucsselprojfile, "%s.multi-%s", nucsselfile, ProjectiontoStr(&P));
00816       if (!(outfp = fopen(nucsselprojfile, "w"))) {
00817         fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", nucsselprojfile);
00818         cleanup(-1);
00819       }
00820       fprintinfo(outfp);
00821       fprintProjectinfo(outfp, &P);
00822       showprojectedObservables(outfp, &P, &Int, &Q[0], obs, &multiE, &multiA, "");
00823       fclose(outfp);
00824       
00825     } else {
00826 
00827       fprintf(logfp, "\n\n... no many-body state lowers energy enough, stopping here\n");
00828       // indicate we have finished
00829       char nucsselfinfile[1024];
00830       sprintf(nucsselfinfile, "%s.finished", outfile);
00831 
00832       FILE* finfp;
00833       if (!(finfp = fopen(nucsselfinfile, "w"))) {
00834         break;
00835       }
00836       fclose(finfp);
00837 
00838       done = 1;
00839     }
00840 
00841   }
00842 
00843   fclose(logfp);
00844 
00845   cleanup(0);
00846 
00847 #ifdef MPI
00848   }
00849 #endif
00850 
00851 }
